name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky
description: Runs in windowed 1920x1080 for convenience. This can be changed without issue.

task.description: Installing d3dx9, this could take a while...
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the GOG installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Clear Sky/xrEngine.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /NOCANCEL /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Running GOG Installer
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    description: Installing d3dx9, this could take a while...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1920x1080
